DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate efficacy and safety, when administering PA21, in peritoneal dialysis patients having hyperphosphatemia.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase III Study of PA21 in Peritoneal Dialysis Patients With Hyperphosphatemia
DOC.criteria: Receiving stable maintenance peritoneal dialysis Peritoneal dialysis patients with hyperphosphatemia Patients having history of a pronounced brain / cardiovascular disorder Patients having severe gastrointestinal disorders Patients having severe hepatic disorders
